1.0.name: wordpress/wp-buzzer
1.0.description:
WP Buzzer Plugin allows you to add a post/page/blog to Google Buzz. It displays a Google Buzz button after each post and page. It also features a widget that you can put in your sidebar. You can manage it's visibility on the plugin options page. Features:

  • Display a Google Buzz button after each post and page
  • Widget with Google Buzz button

You can see a demo on my website : artiko.net.pl
